thread.title: Steve Carell Cruelly Tricked Us All Into Believing The Office Was Coming Back (It’s Not)
thread.title_full: Steve Carell Cruelly Tricked Us All Into Believing The Office Was Coming Back (It’s Not)

author: Dana Eisenberg
title: Steve Carell Cruelly Tricked Us All Into Believing The Office Was Coming Back (It’s Not)
text:
Steve Carell Cruelly Tricked Us All Into Believing The Office Was Coming Back (It’s Not) by Dana Eisenberg | 6:20   
It feels like every show is being rebooted. Gilmore Girls came out with four new episodes in November, Arrested Development is probably getting a fifth season, and at this point we’re actually starting to have hope that Friends may get the gang back together after all. So why not The Office ? Steve Carell made a lot of people’s days today when he tweeted that the beloved workplace sitcom was coming back: Breaking News: “The Office” returning to NBC. 
— Steve Carell (@SteveCarell) January 18, 2017 
Obviously, Twitter lost its collective mind:
